text: Niscayanga, miru allah nu vadali vigrahalanu aradhistu, oka abhuta kalpana cestunnaru. Niscayanga, allah nu vadali miru evarinaite, aradhistunnaro, variki miku jivanopadhini samakurce yogyata ledu. Kavuna miru, mi jivanopadhini allah nundiye apeksincandi mariyu ayanane aradhincandi. Mariyu ayanake krtajnulai undandi. Miranta ayana vaipunake maralimpabadataru
